job_description:
We are a product based software company on a mission to help shoppers provide for their families by making life more affordable all by leveraging technology.

What we are looking for is a Senior Director of Data Engineering. In this role we are really looking for a seasoned veteran who has climbed up the ranks, failed a few times, gotten up and have grown throughout your career. We need someone that has experience leading large teams of about 50-60 people. This role is focused on strategy and people, you will not be hands on at all and you will need to have the capabilities to be a senior leader, partner with our CEO and executives.

Big plusses in this role is if you have experience with streaming and came from a software engineering background.

This is a unique opportunity to work in the Data field at a high level and influence the direction of our data environment with your thought leadership and expertise.

If you are ready for the challenge, then don’t hesitate to apply! Required Skills & Experience
10+ years of professional experience as a Data engineer and or Data or Software management or Director or Head level experience
Experience leading teams of 50-60 people
Experience working with multiple departments, groups and executives
Exceptional communication skills
Desired Skills & Experience
Experience working with realtime streaming data
Previous experience as a software engineer in your past roles
Cloud & Spark
What You Will Be Doing Tech Breakdown
100% Data strategy and people management
Daily Responsibilities
100% Leadership
The Offer
Competitive salary
You Will Receive The Following Benefits
Medical, Dental, Vision Insurance
RRSP Match
Unlimited vacation
Stock options
Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the Canada on a full-time basis now and in the future.
